resources.string: You\u0027re using %2$s for mobile data. If you switch to %1$s, %2$s will no longer be used for mobile data.
Connect to data services when roaming

Your vehicle\u2019s head unit will turn off mobile data once it reaches the limit you set.\n\nSince data usage is measured by the head unit, and your carrier may account for usage differently, consider setting a conservative limit.
Data usage is measured by your device. It may vary from your mobile carrier\u2019s data.
Turning off the vehicle internet may prevent some vehicle features or apps from working.\n\nCritical data required to operate your vehicle will continue to be shared with the vehicle manufacturer.
Vehicle internet is turned off. This may prevent some vehicle features or apps from working. Critical data required to operate your vehicle will continue to be shared with the vehicle manufacturer.
Wi\u2011Fi will turn back on near high\u2011quality saved networks, like your home network
Unavailable because location is turned off. Turn on location.
Use mobile data when Wi\u2011Fi has no internet access. Data usage charges may apply.
Choose at least one band for Wi\u2011Fi hotspot:
Wi\u2011Fi hotspot will turn off if no devices are connected
No devices found. Make sure devices are turned on and available to connect.
Something came up. The application has cancelled the request to choose a device.
Bluetooth will turn on to pair
An app wants to turn on Bluetooth
An app wants to turn off Bluetooth
%1$s wants to make your headunit visible to other Bluetooth devices for %2$d seconds.
An app wants to make your headunit visible to other Bluetooth devices for %1$d seconds.
%1$s wants to turn on Bluetooth and make your headunit visible to other devices for %2$d seconds.
An app wants to turn on Bluetooth and make your headunit visible to other devices for %1$d seconds.
Type the pairing code then press Return or Enter
Allow %1$s to access your contacts and call history
You may also need to type this PIN on the other device.
You may also need to type this passkey on the other device.
Set volume for music and videos
Control app access to your data
If you force stop an app, it may misbehave.
Turning it on can cause potential system instability or long-term hardware impact. Do you want to continue?
If you disable this app, Android and other apps may no longer function as intended.
Remove permissions and free up space
Uses system resources to prioritize app performance
Let this app use mobile data
Use mobile data only when app is in the foreground
Note: After a reboot, this app can\'t start until you unlock your vehicle.
Allow the assist app to access the screen contents as text
Allow the assist app to access an image of the screen
The assistant will be able to read information about apps in use on your system, including information visible on your screen or accessible within the apps.

Make sure you trust this app

%1$s uses what\'s on your screen to determine what can be autofilled.
You\u2019ve chosen to launch this app by default for some actions.
Control app access to your data
This permission allows an app to modify system settings.

%1$s will be able to read all notifications, including personal information such as contact names and the text of messages you receive. It will also be able to dismiss notifications or trigger action buttons they contain.\n\nThis will also give the app the ability to turn Do Not Disturb on or off and change related settings.
If you turn off notification access for %1$s, Do Not Disturb access may also be turned off.
Premium SMS may cost you money and will add up to your carrier bills. If you enable permission for an app, you will be able to send premium SMS using that app.
Usage access allows an app to track what other apps you\u2019re using and how often, as well as your carrier, language settings, and other details.
Wi-Fi control allows an app to turn Wi-Fi on or off, scan and connect to Wi-Fi networks, add or remove networks, or start a local-only hotspot.
Allow apps you specify to access your location
If you turn this off, it will remove location access for all apps. Driver Assistance apps will still have access.
Driver Assistance apps cannot access your location
Allow apps that help with driving to access your location
If you turn this off, Driver Assistance apps that rely on location information will be disabled.
Location may use sources like GPS, Wi\u2011Fi, mobile networks, and sensors to help estimate your device\u2019s location.
Location information sent to Driver Assistance apps doesn’t contain information that identifies you. It’s stored for a maximum of 2 days before being deleted.
Allow all apps to access your microphone
About, legal info, reset, and more
Status of the battery, network, and other information
View legal info, status, software version
Satellite imagery providers:\n©2014 CNES / Astrium, DigitalGlobe, Bluesky
There is a problem loading the licenses.
No need, you are already a developer.
This will reset all network settings, including:
This will not cancel your service plan.
Reset all network settings? You can\u2019t undo this action!

This will reset all preferences for:


Disabled apps

Disabled app notifications

Any permission restrictions

You will not lose any app data.
Erase all data and profiles from the infotainment system

This will erase all data from your vehicle’s infotainment system, including:


Your Google Account

System and app data and settings

Downloaded apps
You are currently signed into the following accounts:
Other profiles have been set up for this vehicle.
This will erase all your personal profile data, accounts, and downloaded apps on this infotainment system.\n\nYou can\u2019t undo this action.
Set date, time, time zone, & formats
The admin will be able to delete other profiles, including those for other admins, and factory reset the infotainment system.
After you create a new profile, that person should customize it for themselves.
Apps can be updated from any profile for use by all other profiles.
"All apps and data for this profile will be deleted"
Profile wasn\'t deleted. You can restart the device and try again.
This profile will be deleted when you switch profiles or restart the vehicle.
"If you delete the only remaining profile for this vehicle, all data, settings, and apps associated with this profile will be erased."
"After reset, you can set up a new profile."
You need at least one admin. To delete this one, first choose a replacement.
System includes files used to run Android version %s
All this app\u2019s data will be deleted permanently. This includes all files, settings, accounts, databases, etc.

Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your device.\n\nSome accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the phone to the web. A Google Account works this way.
This will conserve data, but you\u2019ll need to sync each account manually to collect recent information. And you won\u2019t receive notifications when updates occur.
Removing this account will delete all of its messages, contacts, and other data from the device!
Sync is currently experiencing problems. It will be back shortly.

This will allow anyone to access your account

Common PINs are blocked by your IT admin. Try a different PIN.
This can\'t include an invalid character.
Password invalid, must be at least 4 characters.
Device admin doesn\'t allow using a recent password
Common passwords are blocked by your IT admin. Try a different password.
Must contain at least one letter
Must contain at least one digit
Must contain at least one symbol
Ascending, descending, or repeated sequence of digits isn\'t allowed

Activating this infotainment system app will allow the app %1$s to perform the following operations:

The organization manager can monitor and manage apps and data associated with this profile, including settings, permissions, corporate access, network activity, and the vehicle\'s location information.

The organization manager can monitor and manage apps and data associated with this profile, including settings, permissions, corporate access, network activity, and the device\'s location information.

The organization manager can monitor and manage apps and data associated with this infotainment system, including settings, permissions, corporate access, network activity, and the vehicle\'s location information.
The organization manager may be able to access data associated with this infotainment system, manage apps, and change this vehicle\’s settings.

This vehicle\'s organization manager requested a bug report to help troubleshoot this device. Apps and data may be shared, and your device may temporarily slow down.
